info_supernode: Please connect to a Supernode closest to your geographical region
organization_name_hint: What would you like to be called?
display_name_hint: If you are joining a group, enter the name here
change_password_hint: Para sa mga kadahilanang pangseguridad, maaaring mai-reset lamang ang iyong password ng isang beses / buwan!
supernode_instructions: Pick the Supernode that is closest to your M2 Pro location
reg_required: Ang patlang na ito ay kinakailangan
reg_morethan: Ang patlang na ito ay dapat na hindi bababa sa 6 na character ang haba
reg_invalid_password: Hindi bababa sa walong character, na naglalaman ng isang titik, isang numero at isang espesyal na simbolo
reg_password_not_same: Ang password at password pang kumpirma ay dapat na pareho
bind_wechat_title: Would you like to bind your WeChat account with a new account?
bind_wechat_desc: If you already have an account for this Supernode, and you create a new account, your new account will not have access to your current account’s wallet.
bind_existing_account2wechat_desc: Let’s bind your existing Supernode account with your WeChat account.
bind_new_account2wechat_desc: Please enter a valid email address to assist with account recovery.
shopify_email_instruction: Please enter the email you used for purchasing M2 PRO on Shopify
confirm_wechat_unbind: Please confirm that you have access to {0}. If you cannot access this email account, and if you continue unbinding, you will lose access to your Supernode account.
reg_network_server: Mangyaring pumili ng isang server ng network
reg_gateway_profile: Mangyaring pumili ng profile ng SMB Gateway
reg_gateway_location: Mangyaring maglagay ng lokasyon ng Gateway sa mapa
register_reseller_success: You have successfully registered {0} in your reseller account. Once the M2 Pro owner registers their miner it will appear in your reseller account. Please contact support if the miner does not appear 24 hours after the M2 Pro owner registered their device.
confirm_deleting_miner_title: Are you sure to delete the miner?
confirm_deleting_miner_message: Once you delete the miner, you won't be able to recover.
input_serial_number: o manu-manong ipasok ang serial number
info_downlink_price: MXC pre-sets this price in order to use the market average. The downlink price is the price people pay you to receive data
sure_switch_organization: Sigurado ka bang nais mong baguhin ang mga Organisasyon?
select_gateway_profile: Ang isang opsyonal na Gateway-profile ay maaaring italaga sa isang Gateway.
gateway_profile_tip: Ginagamit ang pagsasaayos na ito upang awtomatikong i-configure muli ang Gateway sa sandaling ang LoRa Gateway Bridge ay na-configure upang maayos nitong mapamahalaan ang pag-configure ng packet-forwarder
select_network_server: Piliin ang Network-Server kung saan makakonekta ang M2Pro Miner.
network_server_tip: Kung walang magagamit na mga network-server sa drop-down, mangyaring tiyaking mayroong isang service-profile para sa organisasyong ito
reg_name: Ang Pangalan ay maaaring maglaman ng mga salita, numero at gitling lamang
discovery_enabled_tip: Kapag pinagana (at ang LPWAN Server ay naka-configure na pinagana ang tampok na tuklasin ang M2Pro Miner), magpapadala ang M2Pro Miner ng mga pana-panahong pings upang subukan ang saklaw nito laban sa iba pang mga M2Pro Miner sa parehong network
gateway_altitude_tip: Kapag ang M2Pro Miner ay may isang on-board GPS, awtomatikong maitatakda ang halaga sa lalong madaling nakatanggap ang network ng mga istatistika mula sa M2Pro Miner
drag_marker_tip: I-drag ang marker sa lokasyon ng Gateway. Kung ang Gateway ay may isang on-board GPS, awtomatikong maitatakda ang halagang ito, sa sandaling makatanggap ang network ng mga istatistika mula sa Gateway.
send_deposit_address: Only send {0} to this deposit address!
send_coin_tip: Sending any coin or token other than {0} to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.
deposit_confirm_tip: Your {0} will be deposited after 12 network confirmations.
info_current_transaction_fee: You must ensure you have at least this fee amount in order to cover costs
staking_trade_tip: Pinapahusay ng Staking ang pangangalakal ng data, na nagbibigay sa lahat ng may hawak ng isang patas na paraan upang makilahok sa network
reg_amount: Ang halaga ay dapat na higit sa 0
amount_8decimal: The amount cannot have more than 8 decimal places
withdraw_submit_tip: Ang iyong kahilingan sa pag-withdraw ay matagumpay na naisumite, kukumpirmahin ng Supernode Operator ang transaksyong ito sa loob ng susunod na araw ng negosyo
staked_submit_tip: Matagumpay na naisumite ang iyong hingin na Stake
scan_code: Mangyaring ilagay ang QR Code sa naka-highlight na kahon
dhx_staking_mining_earning: DHX Staking, Mining, and Earning Boosts
sign_up: Mag-sign Up gamit ang iyong email
send_email: Please enter the verification code we sent to your email.
agree_conditions: Sumasang-ayon ako sa Mga Tuntunin at Kundisyon ng MXC
send_marking_information: Magpadala sa akin ng mahalagang impormasyon sa marketing na nauugnay sa MXC
read_privacy_policy: I have read and agreed to the privacy policy
qr_desc_01: Pinapayagan ka ng mga Authenticator app na makabuo ng mga security code sa iyong mobile device.
qr_desc_03: 1. Buksan ang iyong authenticator app at magdagdag ng isang bagong token na nakabatay sa oras.
qr_desc_04: 2. I-scan ang QR code sa ibaba.
enter_security_01: Mangyaring, ipasok ang security code na nabuo ng iyong authenticator app upang i-verify na na-configure nang tama.
recovery_cd_desc_02: Isulat ang mga backup code na ito. Maaari itong magamit kung nawala mo ang iyong 2FA.
recovery_cd_desc_04: Sinulat ko sila at inilagay sa isang ligtas na lugar.
wthdr_ent_code_02: Get a verification code from the Authenticator
wthdr_ent_code_03: app, or use one of your backup codes
24hours_warning: Ang bawat pag-withdraw ay napapailalim sa isang screening sa seguridad na maaaring tumagal ng hanggang 24 na oras sa mga araw ng negosyo.
update_dialog_content: Mayroong isang bagong bersyon na magagamit sa mga pinaka-advanced na tampok, mangyaring i-click ang kumpirmahin upang mag-upgrade!
smart_bluetooth_connect: Mangyaring ikonekta ang aparatong ito sa mga setting ng Bluetooth
connected_device_success: Matagumpay mong nai-konekta ang iyong oracle. Panahon na upang maging aktibo, upang masubukan nang husto ang iyong lakas ng signal. Simulang gumawa ng ilang mga footprints!
set_borders_desc: Ang iyong Gateway ay kung saan nagsisimula ang lahat. I-drag ang pin upang magtakda ng isang hangganan sa paligid ng iyong Gateway at makatanggap ng isang abiso kung ang iyong device ay wala sa saklaw.
oracle_desc: Ang Oracle ay isang device ng pagbabahagi ng IoT Data. Upang kumita ng MXC token kakailanganin mong punan ang iyong mga detalye sa ibaba. Kung hindi mo nais na kumita ng MXC token maaari mong laktawan ang hakbang na ito.
device_who_use: Sino ang gumagamit ng device na ito?
alert_setting_desc: Aabisuhan ka kung ang aparato ay lumalabas sa iyong paunang natukoy na hangganan ng data.
set_border_step1: Mag-tap sa isang Gateway upang maitakda ang hangganan
set_border_step2: I-drag ang pin sa paligid ng Gateway.
name: Pangalan
view_week_footprints: Tingnan ang Mga Footprint ng Linggong Ito
view_all_footprints: Tingnan ang Lahat ng mga Footprint
delete_all_footprints: Tanggalin ang Lahat ng mga Footprint
device_bluetooth_prompt: Pumili ng isang Bluetooth device mula sa listahan ng mga device. Siguraduhin na ang iyong
tutorial_page2_txt1: Locking MXC generates mPower (Mining Power) and your DHX Mining income will differ by your mPower
add_miner_tip: Maaari mong i-scan ang QR code o gamitin ang serial na numero.
tutorial_page2_txt2: If you wish to further boost your potential DHX Mining rewards, you will require an M2 Pro Hardware
tutorial_page2_txt3: Yes, you need some DHX to mine DHX. You can purchase DHX from a crypto exchange
tutorial_page2_txt4: Now, everything is all set to mine DHX. Let’s Bond DHX.
tutorial_pg2_text: All strategies below will enable you to receive a larger share of the 5,000 DHX daily mineable amount, increasing your overall mPower
tutorial_pg2_desc1: (The more MXC locked the bigger mPower)
tutorial_pg2_desc2: (if your miner is offline, your boost will be reduced)
tutorial_pv2_title_span1: Next, decide how long you want to lock your MXC.
tutorial_pv2_title_span2: The longer you lock your MXC, the more your mPower will be boosted
tutorial_pv3_title: Become a Council Chair or a Council Member
tutorial_pv3_text_span1: A DHX council chair (per Supernode) is chosen from candidates who have at least
tutorial_pv3_text_span7:
The council chair receives 20% of the council’s mPower. The rewards are high and every participant must join a council.

Once you join a council you can not change the council until your lock period expires.
tutorial_pv4_title_span1: DHX Mining starts as soon as you
tutorial_pv4_title_span3: and will earn daily mining revenue.
tutorial_pv4_title_span6: but limited by the amount of DHX bonded.
tutorial_pv5_text: Let’s assume you have bonded 70 DHX, because of 10:1 bonded to reward ratio and 7 days cooling off period you will be able to mine 1 DHX/day maximum (depending on your mPower). Newly mined DHX will be added to your bonded tokens after 7 days of cooling-off.
tutorial_pv6_text: You will stop earning rewards, and you have to wait for a cooling-off period of 7 calendar days until those locked DHX are unlocked
tutorial_pv7_sub1: I need some DHX to start
tutorial_pv7_sub2: I need mPower to start DHX Mining
tutorial_pv7_sub3: I have mPower ready, let me start Mining
address_book_desc: Idagdag ang iyong madalas na ginamit na address dito, ngunit maaari ka lamang magdagdag ng bago o tanggalin ang address dahil sa mga kadahilanang panseguridad.
address_book_control_desc: Kontrolin ang iyong madalas na ginamit na address dito, mangyaring tandaan na maaari mo lamang tanggalin o idagdag ang address dahil sa kadahilanang pangseguridad.
connectivity_lost: Walang koneksyon sa Internet. Tiyaking naka-on ang Wi-Fi o mobile data, pagkatapos ay subukang muli.
check_recipient_address: Mangyaring suriin nang mabuti ang Tagatanggap na Address upang matiyak na ito mismo ang iyong ipinasok.
stake_warning: Sa sandaling maipagpatuloy mo ang Stake ay hindi ka na makakapag-unstake sa loob ng panahong ito.
choose_unstake: Piliin ang iyong mga Stake assets upang magpatuloy sa pag-UnStake.
staking_trade_tip_2: Palakasin ang iyong kita sa {0}% ng {1} Buwanang Stake. Mangyaring tandaan, hindi ka makakapag-Unstake sa loob ng panahong ito.
staking_trade_tip_2_ver2: Palakasin ang iyong kita sa pamamagitan ng {1} Month Stake. Mangyaring tandaan, hindi ka makakapag-Unstake sa loob ng panahong ito.
staking_trade_tip_regular: Tangkilikin ang regular na rate ng kita at mag UnStake anumang oras na gusto mo.
stake_earn_mxc: Mag Stake at Kumita ng MXC
info_mxc_vault: Choose your preferred staking method / rewards
info_flex_stake: Stake “Flex” enables you to cease staking at any time you wish
one_reset_email_month: Tanging isang pag-reset ng password sa email ang maaaring maipadala bawat buwan
under_maintenance: We are currently undergoing maintenance. This won’t take long.
lock_tip: To mine DHX you need to lock MXC to generate mPower (Mining Power).
bonding_calendar_note: Note: +(value) - amount of DHX mined on given day
bond_dhx_instruction_1: You will need DHX in your wallet, if you haven’t deposit DHX yet please
bond_dhx_instruction_2: To earn revenue from bonding you need mPower, which is generated by locking MXC or using an M2Pro Miner. If you haven’t locked MXC yet, please
bond_dhx_confirm_info: You are about to bond {0} DHX. You can unbond any amount of DHX at any time, but unbonding takes 7 days to complete.
bond_dhx_successful:
Congratulations!
You are now Mining DHX
unbond_dhx_instruction: Your may unbond your bonded DHX at any time, but you will stop earning rewards, and you have to wait for a cooling-off period of 7 calendar days until those locked DHX are unlocked and may be withdrawn back to your wallet
unbond_dhx_confirm_info: You are about to unbond {0} DHX. Please note that you will need to wait 7 days for the cooling-off period.
lock_tip_detailed: Boost your mining power by {0}% with a {1} month lock. You will be able to claim your locked token as soon as the lock period is complete.
join_council_tip_1: Join any council in your Supernode, participate in DataHighway governance and vote on proposals.
join_council_tip_2: You can only change council once your lock period is complete. The council chair receives a 20% Mining Power bonus, this is calculated via the total sum of Mining Power of the council.
council_requirments_1: Your Mining meets the Council Chair requirement.
council_requirments_list:
1. Minimum 5000000 MXC Lock
2. Minimum 12 Month Lock Duration
3. Minimum 5 Miners
council_requirments_2: Council Chair gets 20% Mining Power bonus calculated from the sum of the Mining power of the council. Do you want to become one?
no_councils_description: Your Supernode does not have Councils yet. You can wait until someone creates a council or you can create one by meeting the below requirements.
council_requirments_not_meet_1: Your Mining does not meet the Council Chair requirement.
council_requirments_not_meet_2: Please join a Council from the Council lists
mining_confirm_tip: Once you proceed the mining you won’t be able to unlock MXC and change council within {0} months.
lock_confirm_message: You are about to lock {0} MXC for {1} months, joining {2}’s council for DHX mining
congrats_mining:
Congratulations!
You are now Mining DHX
info_mxc_lock: Choose your preferred lock method / rewards
info_lock_boost: Boosts provided by an M2 Pro Miner are capped at 1 million mPower per miner.
amount_of_miner_desc: Amount of M2 Pro You Operate
